body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Peter Hayes and the customer's name is Susan Green.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Peter Hayes, and I am with ABC Pawn Shop. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Peter. I have some questions regarding your privacy policies.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Susan! I’d be happy to help with that. Could I first ask you for your last name to better assist you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my last name is Green.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Susan Green. Now, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Just to confirm, can you also provide your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s two zero three, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Susan. Now, regarding our privacy policy, we ensure that all customer information is kept secure and confidential.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds good. I appreciate you clarifying that for me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome! Thank you for your time, Susan. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
